constantValues: A gift transaction can be a one-time payment or a recurring payment (ie, monthly/sustainer giving). In addition, it can be a pledge (ie, promise) of a future payment or a current/received payment.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the entity with respect to the base currency.

members.name: lastPaymentDate

constantValues: The date by which the payment schedule is expected to be fully paid.

definitions.description: A gift transaction can be a one-time payment or a recurring payment (ie, monthly/sustainer giving). In addition, it can be a pledge (ie, promise) of a future payment or a current/received payment.
